title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupts layout
description: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupts layout in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of remaining in place, the second row is also removed.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted, while the second row should remain intact.
SR:
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row remains intact.
